projects.title: STPU
projects.description: A tensor core, similar to those found in machine learning-focused products from the likes of Nvidia, written in VHDL.

projects.title: IoT
projects.description: Software lead on an IoT pet feeder. This involved systems design, interacting with cloud services and an Android app, and writing lots of C++. As software lead, my role also involved coordination between teammates, project management, and "devops" such as showing people Git.

projects.title: 3D Printer
projects.description: CAD model of an innovative multi-axis FDM 3D printer, to produce objects with less supports and more resistance to delamination. This was a capstone project for an engineering design class. I used Autodesk Inventor to model and simulate the design.
